Renewable Ape Collection

The Renewable Ape Collection is a spin-off of the popular Bored Ape Yacht Club Collection, but not associated with them in any way. The purpose of this collection is to provide a fun way for the SolarWind Token community to win cool pieces NFT artwork as a thank you for being part of the SolarWind Army. There will be 10 unique Renewable Apes in all and 30 minted copies of each Ape.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text admin_label=”NFT: Installer Ape” module_class=”nft-item” _builder_version=”4.9.10″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Renewable Ape Collection

Installer Ape

View NFT >

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
